Go to your post
 Click on Edit
 you will see a "delete message" text block
 there will be a check circle that says "delete message"
 click on this check circle
 then click on the "delete this message" bar at the bottom of the "delete message" block
 
 If it is the first post in a thread, the whole thread goes with it. If it is in the middle of a thread, all the following posts get renumbered.
 
 You cannot reinsert the post in its original position.
 
 Deletion...It's a simple thing to do.
 
 However, you shouldn't feel bad about making lame posts. A lot of people do that.
